name: Zhuan Zhuan
description: Zhuan Zhuan has deployed TiDB in multiple clusters for the messaging and risk management applications. These TiDB clusters hold several dozens of TBs of data with excellent and stable performance. This post will elaborate on how TiDB helps Zhuan Zhuan handle vast data size and build better applications for its users.

name: Mobike
description: Mobike has been using the TiDB database in the production environment since early 2017. Now they have deployed TiDB in multiple clusters with close to 100 nodes, handling dozens of TBs of data for different application scenarios. This post will provide a deep dive on why Mobike chose TiDB over MySQL and its sharding solutions by illustrating how TiDB solves their pain points.

name: Yiguo.com
description: As the largest B2C fresh produce online marketplace in China, serving close to 5 million users and more than 1,000 enterprise customers, Yiguo.com entrusts TiDB to capture perishable insights in order to make timely and accurate business decisions.
